title: An improved error term for counting $D_4$-quartic fields
abstract: We prove that the number of quartic fields $K$ with discriminant $|Î”_K|\leq X$ whose Galois closure is $D_4$ equals $CX+O(X^{5/8+\varepsilon})$, improving the error term in a well-known result of Cohen, Diaz y Diaz, and Olivier. We prove an analogous result for counting quartic dihedral extensions over an arbitrary base field.
